articles.description: Reaction to England's 1-0 victory over Serbia at Euro 2024, which gives them an opening win in Group C, plus all the latest from the tournament.
articles.title: Euro 2024 live: Reaction as England beat Serbia in Group C opener

articles.description: Ex-England captain Alan Shearer says Harry Kane's role against Serbia was different to what we are used to, but just as important for the team.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Harry Kane is not England's playmaker - Alan Shearer

articles.description: Jude Bellingham's remarkable rise continued as he netted England's winner in their Euro 2024 opener against Serbia.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham: England's Euro 2024 star 'who writes his own scripts'

articles.description: American Bryson DeChambeau wins his second US Open title after Rory McIlroy collapses with three bogeys in final four holes.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Bryson DeChambeau beats Rory McIlroy for second major

articles.description: Gareth Southgate has plenty of food for thought after England's "solid rather than spectacular" start at Euro 2024, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: England 1-0 Serbia: Euro 2024 talking points as Jude Bellingham shines

articles.description: France striker Kylian Mbappe says his new club Real Madrid would not let him play at the Olympics in Paris this summer.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Austria v France preview

articles.description: Billy Gilmour’s journey is one not travelled alone and there are plenty fans who want him starting for Scotland against Switzerland.
articles.title: Billy Gilmour - journey from 'Oor Billy' to Scotland's hope

articles.description: Erik ten Hag says Manchester United visited him while on holiday in Ibiza and asked him to stay as manager.
articles.title: Erik ten Hag: Manchester United showed up on my doorstep to ask me to stay

articles.description: Andy Murray says Jack Draper can go to the "top of the world rankings" after his Stuttgart Open win.
articles.title: Jack Draper: Andy Murray tips new British number one for 'top of world rankings' after Stuttgart win

articles.description: Updates from the Scotland camp as their second Euro 2024 Group A match with Switzerland approaches.
articles.title: Scotland at Euro 2024: Latest from camp as Swiss game approaches - live text
